MIPS INSTRUCTION LIST

R - TYPE 
OP 6B | RS 5B | RT 5B| RD 5B| shamt 5B| func 5B


add r1 r2 r3
00000000010000110000100000100000

sub r1 r2 r3
00000000010000110000100000100010

addi r1 r2 0x0200 (512)
00100000010000010000001000000000

SLT - set less than
101010

BEQ - branch eq


BNE - branch !eq



add r3 r1 r2
sub r4 r1 r2
addi r5 r5 0x3
00000000001000100001100000100000
00000000001000100010000000100010
00100000101001010000000000000011
